Title: jsonb_path_query
Feature: jsonb_path_query ( target jsonb, path jsonpath [, vars jsonb [, silent boolean ]] ) â†’ setof jsonb
Description: Returns all JSON items returned by the JSON path for the specified JSON value. For SQL-standard JSON path expressions it returns the JSON values selected from target. For predicate check expressions it returns the result of the predicate check: true, false, or null. The optional vars and silent arguments act the same as for jsonb_path_exists.
